about_the_game:
Overcoming all odds and heading towards the Hurricane




CubeCube is an animated 3D Roguelite game. Every failure will start over again.
The ancient land was covered by water, CubeCube has to make a decision for the sealed creature. Beat whoever stand against CubeCube, build your own combat style. Discover the ancient relic and head to the Hurricane.

Feature of CubeCube

  • Tightly combat, make decision between rolling and attack, catch opportunity, beat enemy!
  • Upgrade unceasingly, build your own combat style.
  • Fails is a new begin.
  • CubeCube can recall and transform to each characters who has been defeated by CubeCube.
  • Some of level will spawn randomly
  • CubeCube can customize the attack action sequence

name: CubeCube Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
